text: Pamela Yvonne "Pam" Tillis (born July 24, 1957) is an American country music singer and actress. She began her career in 1981. In 1991, she had a song in the Top 40 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs for the first time. Tillis has released many albums. Two of them are Put Yourself in My Place and Sweetheart's Dance. Tillis was born in Florida. She was raised in Nashville, Tennessee. Her father is the late country music singer Mel Tillis. ==Related pages== *List of country musicians from Florida ==References== Category:Singers from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Singers from Florida Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Country musicians from Florida Category:1957 births Category:Living people
title: Pam Tillis
